items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Total net revenue: One hundred fifty-eight billion one hundred four million dollars. Total noninterest expense: Eighty-seven billion one hundred seventy-two million dollars. Pre-provision profit: Seventy billion nine hundred thirty-two million dollars.
Emphasizes commitment to corporate responsibility and adherence to compliance.
Achieved record revenue of one hundred sixty-two point four billion dollars and net income of forty-nine point six billion dollars.
